H0.text: Whose summer residence is at Lake Gandalfo, a small town south-east of Rome. Italian Presidents

H1.text: Whose summer residence is at Lake Gandalfo, a small town south-east of Rome. Roman Nobility

H2.text: Whose summer residence is at Lake Gandalfo, a small town south-east of Rome. Vatican Diplomats

H3.text: Whose summer residence is at Lake Gandalfo, a small town south-east of Rome. Popes

A4.text: The Apostolic Palace of Castel Gandolfo has served as the summer residence and vacation retreat for most popes since 1626.
